document_data.mainbody:
Unique Mageries was an arcane spellbook penned by Nezram, a wizard who traveled the planes extensively. It contained 21 spells ranging from common to unique or rare.
Unique Mageries was a large tome that measured four handwidths wide by ten handwidths tall. Polished ivory formed both the front and rear cover. Each cover was decorated with inlaid ebony. Each of the 21 pages was gilt-edged and held a single spell.
Unique Mageries contained the following spells
magic missile &bull stinking cloud &bull wizard lock &bull dispel magic &bull feign death &bull gust of wind &bull infravision &bull tongues &bull water breathing &bull fear &bull fumble &bull polymorph self &bull remove curse &bull wall of sand &bull wizard eye &bull telekinesis &bull anti-magic shell &bull Nezrams ruby ray &bull spelltrap &bull power word, blind &bull spellstrike
Nezram left the tome behind on Toril sometime during the 7 century DR when he traveled to another plane and never returned. It was taken from Nezrams tower by the green dragon Chathuulandroth who held it within his lair for 600 years before adventurers from the Black Gauntlet seized it from him. The book was rented to Elminster who copied its spells.
